subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Luol Deng scored 14 of his 26 points in the final quarter, lifting Chicago to a thunderous victory to seize a 2-0 lead in the best-of-seven games series.
snippet: Luol Deng scored 14 of his 26 points in the final quarter, lifting Chicago to a thunderous victory to seize a 2-0 lead in the best-of-seven games series.
